mapper.sql: select id, template_id, title, applicant_id, status, current_node_id, form_data, attachments, apply_time, finish_time, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark from im_approval
mapper.select: select distinct a.id, a.template_id, a.title, a.applicant_id, a.status, a.apply_time, a.finish_time, a.create_time, u.nickname as applicant_name from im_approval a inner join im_approval_node n on a.template_id = n.template_id left join im_user u on a.applicant_id = u.id where a.status = 'PENDING' and find_in_set(#{approverId}, n.approvers) order by a.create_time desc

select a.id, a.template_id, a.title, a.applicant_id, a.status, a.apply_time, a.create_time, u.nickname as applicant_name from im_approval a left join im_user u on a.applicant_id = u.id where a.applicant_id = #{applicantId} order by a.create_time desc

select distinct a.id, a.template_id, a.title, a.applicant_id, a.status, a.apply_time, a.finish_time, a.create_time, u.nickname as applicant_name from im_approval a inner join im_approval_record r on a.id = r.approval_id left join im_user u on a.applicant_id = u.id where r.approver_id = #{approverId} order by r.action_time desc
